data.Name: Part 1 Question
data.Question: What can you see in this picture? Can you see any animals? How many? Where is the sun that was calling Serapana? What colour is the sun?

data.Name: Part 2 Question
data.Question: What is Serapana holding? Who are Serapana’s friends? What is the silly Duck doing? What is on his head?

data.Name: Part 3 Question
data.Question: What has happened? Why does she need water? What do you think they can do? Who is hiding in the bushes?

data.Name: Part 4 Question
data.Question: Where do you think they are going? How many buckets have they got? (lets count together)

data.Name: Part 5 Question
data.Question: Duck looks like she is having fun – what is she doing? Who of you can swim? What is Serapana doing? What is Hedgehog doing?

data.Name: Part 6 Question
data.Question: Who is in the front of the line? And who is at the back? I can see the sun going down – what does that mean?

data.Name: Part 7 Question
data.Question: Who is helping Serapana water the garden? What vegetables did Hedgehog pick? And what is Squirrel trying to pick?

data.Name: Part 8 Question
data.Question: What do you think is going to happen tomorrow?
